abstract: Three big banks warned about continuing losses in the credit markets, while Barclays of London denied speculation that it was facing a huge write-down of assets.
snippet: Three big banks warned about continuing losses in the credit markets, while Barclays of London denied speculation that it was facing a huge write-down of assets.
lead_paragraph: Three big banks warned yesterday about continuing losses in the credit markets, while Barclays of London denied speculation that it was facing a huge write-down of assets.

headline.main: 3 Big Banks See Troubles; Barclays Falls on Rumors
headline.print_headline: 3 Big Banks See Troubles; Barclays Falls On Rumors

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Julia Werdigier
